verbose_text: Within the first two hours after hepatectomy, the levels of interleukin-6 (IL-6) and tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha) increased in the liver vein, associated with activation of Kupffer cells by gut derived factors such as lipopolysaccharide [XREF_BIBR] resulting in TNF-alpha-dependent secretion of IL-6 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: levels of interleukin-6 (IL-6) and tumor necrosis factor alpha
